price: Ani akkaan araaramaadha nama tawbatee, amanee, gaggaarii hojjatee, sana booda (hanga du’utti) karaa qajeelaa qabateef
arabic: وَإِنِّي لَغَفَّارٞ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا ثُمَّ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī laghaffārun liman tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan thumma ih'tadā
